backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a production tracking system with user authentication, role-based access control (Admin/Viewer), production entries, dispatch tracking, daily production reports, and operation workload management with migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old user profiles without roles into new profiles with a default Admin role assignment.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files describing their functionality and role-based access control implementation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including background, foreground, primary, secondary, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Industrial Production Tracker application with viewport meta tag and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with protected routes, Internet Identity authentication, profile setup modal, theme provider, and navigation to all production tracking pages.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access denied UI component displaying a shield alert icon and message for users without Admin permissions, with logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/DailyProductionR: Admin form component for submitting daily production reports with date picker, operation dropdown, numeric inputs for production metrics, and auto-calculated In Hand field.
Table component displaying daily production reports filtered by date with columns for operation name, today's production, total completed, despatched, and in-hand quantities.
A card-based date range filter component with start and end date inputs, displaying the selected range and enforcing min/max constraints between dates.
frontend/src/components/DispatchEntryFor: A form component for creating new dispatch entries with fields for container type, quantity, dispatch date, destination, and delivery status, using mutation hooks to submit data.
frontend/src/components/DispatchHistoryT: Displays a table of dispatch records with container type, quantity, destination, date, and status; includes admin-only dialog for updating delivery status.
frontend/src/components/EditProductionRe: A dialog component for editing production report entries with validation, allowing updates to today's production, total completed, and despatched values while auto-calculating in-hand inventory.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout with sticky header, responsive navigation (desktop and mobile), logo, and login button; wraps page content and highlights active routes.
frontend/src/components/LiveProductionTa: Displays a table of daily production reports by operation, showing today's production, total completed, despatched, and in-hand quantities with loading skeleton states.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/OperationCompari: Renders a bar chart comparing production quantities across different operations using Recharts, with loading/error states and color-coded bars.
frontend/src/components/OperationWorkloa: Displays a grid of cards showing pending workload counts for each operation (Cutting, Welding, Assembly, Painting) with progress bars and icons.
frontend/src/components/ProductionDashbo: Main dashboard component showing summary cards for total production, dispatch status, and pending operations, plus breakdowns by container type and status.
frontend/src/components/ProductionEntryF: Form component for creating new production entries with fields for container type, quantity, shift details, and status.
frontend/src/components/ProductionHistor: Table displaying detailed production history by date range with columns for operation, production metrics, and optional admin edit actions.
Filterable table showing production entry history with filters for container type and status, displaying formatted dates and status badges.
frontend/src/components/ProductionTrendC: Displays a line chart showing daily total production output across all operations using Recharts, with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup, collecting name, department, and role (Admin/Viewer) with form validation.
frontend/src/components/SummaryCard.tsx: Reusable card component displaying a metric with title, value, icon, optional description, and optional trend indicator.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook managing the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, handling actor creation and query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating production data, user profiles, dispatch entries, and container statuses with toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom industrial-themed color palette for light and dark modes, plus mobile-friendly input styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/DailyProductionReport: Page displaying daily production report form (admin-only) and report table, with role-based access control and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page with title and description, rendering the ProductionDashboard component for real-time operations overview.
Dispatch tracking page that shows DispatchEntryForm for admins and DispatchHistoryTable for all users, with role-based access control checking if user is Admin.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page component displaying Internet Identity authentication UI with Factory icon, app description, and login button with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/OperationWorkloadPage: Simple page wrapper that renders the OperationWorkloadView component with a title and description for viewing current work-in-hand status across manufacturing operations.
frontend/src/pages/ProductionDashboardLi: Main dashboard page displaying live production metrics including monthly target progress (100 containers), daily production summary, production trend charts, and operation comparison charts with real-time data.
frontend/src/pages/ProductionEntryPage.t: Admin-only page for entering production data, displays ProductionEntryForm with role-based access control that shows AccessDeniedScreen for non-admin users.
frontend/src/pages/ProductionHistoryPage: Production history page with date range filtering (default last 30 days) and ProductionHistoryDetailTable, showing read-only notice for non-admin users while allowing admins to edit records.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, extended theme including chart colors, container queries, typography plugin, and custom animations for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project state document describing a responsive industrial production tracking web app for shipping container manufacturing with 17 operations tracked, role-based access control, monthly targets of 100 containers, and complete feature implementation status.
